name: axc7e

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, wal(s0, w0)), w0)
-| wi(wex(s0, wal(s0, w0)), wal(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, wal(s0, w0)), w0)
-| wi(wex(s0, wal(s0, w0)), wal(s0, w0))

comment: Abbreviated version of ~ axc7 using the existential quantifier. Corresponds to the dual of Axiom (B) of modal logic. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 8-Jul-2022.)
